item.description:
Hello Group,

I lead the last ride in Weston, Concord and we had a great time!

Talk about last minute....this Ride takes place TOMORROW!!

We're meeting at the entrance to Wompatuck State Park in Hingham. There are 12 miles of paved bike trails that we'll do. We can do more riding outside the park or do the trails twice if people are up to it.

Here's the link for the map of the park and directions....We'll meet at the park entrance not far from Free St.

My home phone number is 617-254-7912 but I'll forward it to my cell so people can reach me.

http://www.mass.gov/d...
item.name: A VERY last minute ride TOMORROW to Wompatuck State Park in Hingham
